txt.en: Habdir can be found within the Clothiers' Fellow-hall on the Third Circle of Minas Tirith.\n\nYou should speak with Habdir.

'This will do nicely. I believe I have enough now, so long as the war does not last too long. We will all face hardship in the days to come but perhaps a soft place to lay one's head will make all the difference!'
Noble chests can be found on the Fourth Circle of Minas Tirith.\n\nYou should collect donated clothing from noble chests on the Fourth Circle of Minas Tirith.

'Many of the good noble families living on the Fourth Circle left extra clothing for those in the city when they departed for Imloth Melui. There is much bedding and clothing that will need tending to over the days ahead and the extra cloth will be vitally useful. I've collected much of the clothing donated by those who left the city but there is still more to be collected. Do you have a moment to assist me in collecting the last of the clothing on the Fourth Circle?'
Habdir, a Master Clothier, is in need of assistance with gathering donated clothing from nobles on the Fourth Circle.
